pr_title: Response server check style linter violation fix

timeline.message: code commit for response server check style linter issue fixes

timeline.author: nikklassen
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -15,7 +16,7 @@ * Provides activity metadata information like activity identifier, name of activity, version of * activity etc * - *

This + *

This.

replies.bodyText: Sorry, I meant remove this line, it doesn't make sense.
replies.author: nikklassen

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/response-server-ws/src/main/java/com/google/cloud/healthcare/fdamystudies/bean/ActivityMetadataBean.java b/response-server-ws/src/main/java/com/google/cloud/healthcare/fdamystudies/bean/ActivityMetadataBean.java index 1301e8493..3523053c3 100644 --- a/response-server-ws/src/main/java/com/google/cloud/healthcare/fdamystudies/bean/ActivityMetadataBean.java +++ b/response-server-ws/src/main/java/com/google/cloud/healthcare/fdamystudies/bean/ActivityMetadataBean.java @@ -16,7 +16,7 @@ import lombok.ToString; * Provides activity metadata information like activity identifier, name of activity, version of * activity etc * - *

This. + *

This */ @Setter @Getter

timeline.bodyText: What is the abbreviation rule set at? 3 letter abbreviations should be fine.
timeline.author: nikklassen

replies.bodyText: Default abbreviation length set at 1 by check style plugin . maximum permissible consecutive capital letters allowed is 2 .
replies.author: aswinijena100

replies.bodyText: I see, the intention is to actually lowercase abbreviations. OK
replies.author: nikklassen

timeline.bodyText: I would move this comment into the else statement
timeline.author: nikklassen
